description:
Managing Your WordPress Website doesn't have to be a chore.

Using an Application on your Mac or iPad to manage your WordPress website can be a much better experience than having to be online all the time using the WordPress Dashboard.

We'll go over simple management of your website on your Mac, iPad, or iPhone.

  • Manage Posts (Add, Edit, and Delete Posts)
  • Format Text in Posts (Headings, Bold, Italics, Underline, and more)
  • Add Images and Links to your Posts
  • Categorize and Tag your Posts
  • More...
title: Managing Your WordPress Website on a Mac or iPad
